description.value:
>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.PU3uwrAcmGXMGo2n]{Specialization}

Across the galaxy, there are those who are in over their heads and those who must brave the unknown to save the innocent. Whether on an inhospitable planet or a derelict starship, these fearless first responders face the myriad hazards that the universe has to offer, learning how to survive, fight, and rescue others.

Associated Skills: @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.iLlBAZBfHJMZQRQx]{Athletics} and @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.d4fcGwOcrsuYrwGH]{Medicine}. You can attempt a Medicine check with a +4 bonus to make a trick attack by analyzing a target’s body for weak points.

Specialization Exploit: @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.qfdLaLl6DqIG0oyC]{Versatile Movement (Ex)}

@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.XYLdqEcI8K3Rc4QA]{Emergency Medical Treatment (Ex)}: At 11th level, you can spend 1 Resolve Point as a standard action to attempt a @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.d4fcGwOcrsuYrwGH]{Medicine} check to treat deadly wounds or administer first aid. If you succeed, this doesn’t count toward the number of times per day that a creature can benefit from treat deadly wounds, though they can benefit from emergency treatment only once per day.
